translation.en: Dad, my interview is about to start.
- What happened to the Wi- Fi? - Try by the window.
translation.ja: 切れてる 移動しろ

translation.en: No, he can't go over by the window. I've just set up all of this here.
translation.ja: ダメよ　せっかく飾ったのに

translation.en: Okay. We're back. Could someone tell Kayla not to blast music while I'm doing this?
translation.ja: 戻った　ケイラに 静かにしてろと伝えて

translation.en: Your interview's not for 15 minutes. Go tell her yourself.
I gotta keep an eye on Mom. We're one step away from baby photos.
Oh, good. How else would anyone know what sport I play?
translation.ja: 分かりやすくていいね

translation.en: Kayla, turn the music down, please.
translation.ja: ケイラ 音量を下げて

translation.en: One day you're gonna be a second late, and I'm gonna worry.
Anyway, I'm on Canadian time. So technically, I'm five hours early.
translation.ja: カナダではまだ５時間ある

translation.en: Ugh, even time is better back home.
You're scoring week in, week out.
translation.ja: 君は毎週 得点を決め

translation.en: Scouts flocking to your games, home and away,
translation.ja: どの試合にも スカウトが群がる

translation.en: and then you move to England!

translation.ja: アントン･ハンマー･ ハマシュトロムは

translation.en: moves to England and sets up a center of excellence
translation.ja: イギリスでチームを設立した

translation.en: that has produced no less than six international superstars.
translation.ja: すでに６人以上 国際的スターが誕生してる

translation.en: Come on. She had no curfew back home. All of this is new for her.
translation.ja: カナダでは門限を 決めなかった

translation.en: She has a curfew because this is new for her.
- Maybe she's with friends. - She doesn't have any friends yet.
translation.ja: 友達といる 友達はいない

translation.en: All right, look. One problem at a time?
Hammarström used to play with your dad, right?
I think it'd be more accurate to say that my dad played with Hammarström.
translation.ja: ハマシュトロムの 仲間でしたが

translation.en: Luke MacBentley did not smash any NHL records.
translation.ja: 父はＮＨＬ(全米ホッケーリーグ)の記録を 破ってません

translation.en: So we got some more questions coming in here from Sean in Alberta.
translation.ja: アルバータのショーンから 質問だ

translation.en: Back home, you are known as the Mac- gician.
translation.ja: 以前はマクジシャンだが

translation.en: Do your new teammates have any nicknames for you yet?
If she's not home by ten, I'm gonna call the police.
It's not so obviously cool as Mac- gician, but--
translation.ja: 前のあだ名がのほうが…

translation.en: - No, no. I'm… I'm still the-- -
On a scale from one to grounded, where do you think you're at?
translation.ja: １から外出禁止まで 罰は何かな？

translation.en: Well, they don't know I snuck into the rink, which is good.
translation.ja: リンクの侵入は知らないし

translation.en: And I've still got the Mac uprooted me and dragged me to England card, so…
translation.ja: イギリスに強制移住させた 弱みもある

translation.en: Same time tomorrow? We need to nail those jumps if we're gonna be ready for Ice Burn.
translation.ja: 明日も同じ時間？ ジャンプを練習したい

translation.en: how are we gonna do Ice Burn? You're in England.
translation.ja: 君はイギリスにいるんだ

translation.en: Just… I love these long- distance skates.
translation.ja: 遠距離スケートは大好きだよ

translation.en: They're… they're great. They're really fun. But I mean, we're not…
translation.ja: 遠距離スケートは大好きだよ 楽しめるけど 僕たちは

translation.en: I'm still your best friend, that's not gonna change, but it's just…
translation.ja: 友情は変わらないけど…

translation.en: I don't know if this is such a good idea. I--
I just thought it wouldn't matter.
I know that sounds crazy. I just thought
translation.ja: イカれてるけど本当よ

translation.en: you can put us in Canada and England
translation.ja: 私たちがカナダやイギリス―

translation.en: or the moon and Timbuktu, and we'd find a way.
translation.ja: 私たちがカナダやイギリス― 月や地の果てにいても 平気だと思ってた

translation.en: I mean, they found ice on the moon, right?
I'm getting princess emojis from people I haven't spoken to since elementary school.
translation.ja: プリンセス絵文字が 送られ続けてる

translation.en: This is your fault. You ruined my interview for Iceblast, Kayla.
translation.ja: お前のせいで面接が台無しだ

translation.en: - You are gonna find a new partner, Kayla. -
translation.ja: パートナーは見つかる

translation.en: Because you, you could skate with anyone.
Wh… Why is Mac getting princess emojis?
and he told 900 people that his nickname was Drama Queen.
translation.ja: あだ名が“ワガママ姫”だと 伝わったから

translation.en: Mama, if I leave the ice earlier, I can change at the rink.
translation.ja: ママ 早く切り上げたら 着替えられた

translation.en: Ava, you need to work on your priorities.
translation.ja: エバ 優先順位をつけて

translation.en: Mama, I need to change at the rink. Mama, I should be at school.
translation.ja: 着替えや学校 大切なのは何？

translation.en: Was. I haven't seen her since your dad stopped playing.
translation.ja: 元夫人 パパがホッケーやめて以来ね
お父さんの天才選手ね

translation.en: All these hockey stars he flies in,
and he can't see the skating sensation right in front of him.
translation.ja: 彼を興奮させる滑りは できない

translation.en: But you're gonna show him, aren't you, Ava?
So, this is an open invitational.
Look, I know it's a bit soon,
translation.ja: もしパートナーが 見つかったら

translation.en: but I just thought if you could find a partner,
translation.ja: もしパートナーが 見つかったら もしパートナーが 見つかったら 〝ブレード･スター〞

translation.en: obviously, you qualify for the UK team through me.
translation.ja: 私が手続きを進めるわ

translation.en: This could be a chance for medals, sweetheart.
translation.ja: メダルの可能性もある

translation.en: You know, your first step on that path.
Mac's only been here two weeks. He's still trying to impress.
translation.ja: マックは存在を アピールしてる

translation.en: Look, there's trying to impress, and then there's just showing off.
Take yesterday, right? Four players surrounding him, and he still did not pass.
translation.ja: 昨日も４人に囲まれたが パスしない

translation.en: And he got around them and scored.
Your brother isn't the one always shouting for a puck that never comes, is he?
translation.ja: 来もしないパックを 求めて叫ぶ弟か

translation.en: Just… Just one teeny, little prank.
translation.ja: 少し ふざけただけさ
仲良くしろ キャプテン命令だ

translation.en: - Do you want some ketchup? - Sure.
Easy, man. You'll put a hole in the net. And my brother.
translation.ja: ネットと弟に穴を開ける気か

translation.en: Training's done. Let's get a drink.
- How many was that? - I've lost count.
If I'm at my best, then you guys are at yours, okay? So…
No need to be a drama queen.
- Do you ever skate? - No, I just work here.
translation.ja: スケートを？ いえ バイト

translation.en: You sure, or just pretend to for free food?
Mum runs the cafe. She likes to keep an eye on me.
translation.ja: 経営者のママが監視してるの

translation.en: I can't answer that, Sky, because I'm not eavesdropping.
translation.ja: 聞いてないから答えられない

translation.en: - Are you some kind of master criminal? - Something like that.
translation.ja: 犯罪者か何か？ そうね

translation.en: Mac. Yeah, yeah. I won the hockey scholarship.
translation.ja: マックだ ホッケーの奨学金でここに

translation.en: I don't know if you realized I was the one banging in all the goals.
translation.ja: ずっとゴールを 決めてたのは俺だ

translation.en: - Are goals important in hockey? - Pretty important.
translation.ja: ゴールは重要？ 重要だ

translation.en: You know, I, uh, got a nice smile, so…
gotta make sure I keep all my teeth.
Oh, just 'cause I thought it would have to be to fit your massive ego.
translation.ja: 高すぎる自尊心も収まるのね
いや 標準の大きさだよ

translation.en: Besides, look, I gotta go get changed,
translation.ja: とにかく 着替えてくる

translation.en: I'll try not to let my massive ego hit the door on the way out.
translation.ja: 自尊心をぶつけないで行くよ

translation.en: Oh, I feel bad. It's like being mean to a puppy.
translation.ja: 子犬をイジメたみたい

translation.en: The only thing Mac and a puppy have in common is needing to be trained.
translation.ja: マックと子犬の共通点は 訓練が必要なこと

translation.en: They might look cute, but give 'em an inch,
and they'll drag your family to a continent where you can't skate.
translation.ja: スケートできない国に移住よ

translation.en: If only we had a rink.
- I was in a pair. - Ah.
- Can you find a partner here? - You sound like my mom.
translation.ja: 相手を探して ママみたい

translation.en: Just, it's never been about that.
- What's it about? - I don't know.
translation.ja: つまり？ 難しいけど

translation.en: Just skating so in sync that you're, like, connected or something.
translation.ja: 息を合わせて滑るには つながりが必要よ

translation.en: I don't know. It's like speaking a new language.
translation.ja: 新しい言葉を覚えていく感じ

translation.en: Sounds very special. I guess that doesn't come along every day.
translation.ja: 確かに簡単ではなさそうね

translation.en: - - Pick up, pick up, pick up, pick up.
You can do a double axel?
Sweetheart, I can hear you thinking from here.

translation.ja: 遅刻しないで　いい？

translation.en: And make sure you bring your skates to the rink today.
translation.ja: スケート靴を忘れないで

translation.en: We sort of maybe asked someone to audition to be your new partner.
translation.ja: 新しいパートナーの審査よ

translation.en: He is great. He's called Archie. He's 15, and trust me.
translation.ja: アーチーという名で15歳なの

translation.en: - This is terrible. - He's, like, half her height.
translation.ja: 最悪だわ 身長が半分だ

translation.en: Well, that is an exaggeration. Maybe three quarters.
Ah, I've been to America before.
So, um, you've been looking for a partner long?
I… I would help you up, but this tends to be where I drop people.
translation.ja: いつも こで落としてしまう

translation.en: Can we please just be honest and acknowledge how bad that was? I'd feel so much better.
translation.ja: ひどかったと認めてくれたら 気分がマシになる

translation.en: - Good. I'm so glad you said. - I'm so sorry, love. It's my fault.
Yeah. I mean, I thought you were bringing him down, really.
Well, Anton's back today, so it'd be good to stay and support Mac.
translation.ja: アントンが戻るから マックと残って

translation.en: He watched you, right? So it'd be nice.

translation.ja: 見てた　優しくしろ
見てた　優しくしろ マック

translation.en: Hammarström can cut me loose at any time. I gotta hit the ground running.
translation.ja: 成功しないと ハマシュトロムに切られる

translation.en: Can I get you a milkshake?
Are you okay? Have you got a fever? Headache?
You know what the doctor said. You're not out of the woods yet. You have to be so careful.
translation.ja: まだ危ないから注意しろと 医者に言われたわ

translation.en: Okay, now I have a headache.
Okay, Hammers. Let's go! Go! Go!
translation.ja: さあ ハマーズ　始めよう

translation.en: Mac, let's show Anton exactly why you're here.
translation.ja: アントンに実力を見せつけろ

translation.en: I need a captain's performance from you today, all right? Captain's. Go.
translation.ja: キャプテンらしい プレーをしろ

translation.en: Tonight is the first time Hammarström has seen the new team.
translation.ja: 初めて彼が新チームを見る

translation.en: We're in this together. So I need you to play together.
- Remember all your goals for the Cyclones? - Yes, coach.
translation.ja: 過去のゴールは？ 覚えてます

translation.en: As far as I'm concerned, tonight is the first time you pulled on skates.
translation.ja: 今夜 初めて スケート靴を履いたように

translation.en: - You show me what you got. - Yes, coach.
translation.ja: 実力を見せろ はい

translation.en: Come. I need a word with my new assistant coach.
translation.ja: 新しい助手と話してくる

translation.en: - Oh, hey, buddy. What's up? - Hi, Anton.
translation.ja: やあ 元気？ アントン

translation.en: Sorry I wasn't here when you arrived.
I had a Legends tour in Russia, then a book launch in Sweden. You know how it is.
translation.ja: 仕事でロシアと スウェーデンにいて

translation.en: - Still, great to be back on the ice again. - Yeah, nothing like it.
translation.ja: 氷に戻れてよかった 本当だね

translation.en: I need you in the stands. Yeah, I want training recorded.
translation.ja: 練習の記録を取ってほしい

translation.en: So, Mac's been training hard, haven't you, Mac?
translation.ja: マックも厳しく練習したわ

translation.en: - Yeah. - This boy's a special player, huh?
I know talent when I see it.
Uh, she's fine. She's just had a bit of a day.
Fast pace, shouty eyes. Now, that's a Kayla storm- off if I've ever seen one.
translation.ja: 怒って急ぎ足で立ち去るのは 慣れてるよ

translation.en: That's typical. First training session with Hammarström,
translation.ja: ハマシュトロムの初練習でも 自分のことばかり

translation.en: you gotta make it all about you? Can't you just let me have my thing?
translation.ja: ハマシュトロムの初練習でも 自分のことばかり 俺のことも考えろ

translation.en: You… Your thing? So it's not enough for you to steal my life in Canada.
translation.ja: 私の人生 ぶち壊して スケートまで奪う気？

translation.en: - Now you wanna take skating from me too? - Oh, my G--
translation.ja: 私の人生 ぶち壊して スケートまで奪う気？ おいおい

translation.en: - Get over yourself, Kayla. - Me and Jacob had something.
translation.ja: うぬぼれるな 私たちは…

translation.en: No, you and Jacob had a hobby.
translation.ja: 趣味の域を超えてない

translation.en: I don't know if you've noticed, but I'm going for the literal NHL here.
translation.ja: だが俺はＮＨＬを目指してる

translation.en: If it was that important, Mom and Dad would've found a way for you to stay.
translation.ja: お前に可能性があるなら 置いてきたはずだ

translation.en: - Yeah, I'm fine. - You don't look fine.
♪ You are good and you are pure The angel knockin' at my door ♪
- We just need to make sure that she's-- - Kayla.
translation.ja: 彼女の気持ちが… ケイラ

translation.en: You can't be a success without discipline, without dedication.
translation.ja: 規律や献身なくして 成功はないの

translation.en: Silly girl. She's gonna get herself hurt.
Pull a stunt like that again, and you're banned from my rink, okay?
translation.ja: 今度 邪魔したら 立ち入り禁止だ

translation.en: Mac, get changed. We're going home. And you, Kayla. Come on. Let's go.
translation.ja: マックとケイラ 着替えて帰るぞ
ニコ マックの位置に

translation.en: What the hell were you thinking? You look at me.
translation.ja: どういうつもりだ？ 顔を見ろ

translation.en: - Um, have you seen hockey? - Don't be smart.
translation.ja: ホッケーは？ いいの

translation.en: Never in anger, and never, ever against your sister.
translation.ja: 怒りに任せ 妹に暴力を振るうな

translation.en: And as for you, we are so disappointed in you, Kayla.
translation.ja: そしてケイラ お前には失望したよ

translation.en: That is not how we brought you up to behave.
translation.ja: 人前で兄に恥をかかせるとは

translation.en: - Humiliating your brother like that. - In front of his whole team.
translation.ja: 人前で兄に恥をかかせるとは 仲間やアントンの前で
仲間やアントンの前で

translation.en: It's not how we do things in our family.
No, I know exactly how we do things in our family.
translation.ja: 我が家らしいことを教えるわ

translation.en: We turn our whole world upside down, give up everything
translation.ja: 私たちが すべてを諦めることで

translation.en: so one person can play a stupid sport.
translation.ja: １人がくだらないスポーツを 続けられる

translation.en: Right. Well, I better start making some dinner, then.
Dad was gonna make three- bean stew, but after the day we've had, no need to inflict that on anyone.
translation.ja: パパの３種の豆シチューは もういいわね

translation.en: It's not me you need to be saying sorry to, is it?
Today is all you need to be apologizing for, okay?
translation.ja: 今日は謝るだけでいい

translation.en: 'Cause everything else we decided as a family.
translation.ja: すべては家族で 決めたことなの

translation.en: Oh, but not like in the Chinooks.
All that warm air coming in over the mountain.
translation.ja: 山を越えて吹く暖かい風で

translation.en: English wind is just, uh, windy.
translation.ja: イギリスの強い風とは違う

translation.en: I'm sorry you miss stuff too.
And you know what I don't miss?
And your brother and your mom.
'Cause Canada might be where we're from, but home, that's wherever we're together.
translation.ja: カナダでなくても 家族は一緒に住むべきだ

translation.en: So, if I had a crazy dream, you'd make it work for me too?
translation.ja: では私の夢も応援する？

translation.en: Well, maybe not for that, uh, that skater your mom found.
translation.ja: ママが見つけた相手は反対だ

translation.en: There's something you need to know.
translation.ja: 知らせたいことがある

translation.en: Please, please. Just, you felt it too.
That connection. I know you did.
I'm guessing that helmet's not for show.
translation.ja: 理由があるのなら 秘密は守るわ

translation.en: So if it's a secret, I'll keep it, but please just tell me who you are.
translation.ja: 理由があるのなら 秘密は守るわ 正体を教えて
